body:
So I decided to make a small 4 team  tournament for the teams unable to play in the Omega tournament.

Requirments:
Must have a minimum of 5 players.
Must have a maximum of 8 players.
Info:
Four team knockout.
3 matches in all.
To compete please comment your team below so I know.
Bracket:

Cinemas vs
               vs
Winner of semi-final1VSWinner of semi-final2
Scheduling:
Team leaders have to schedule a time fit for them.If a no show the team that shows up will be awarded the victory.
Extra stuff:
If a staff would like to close this tournament I will understand and close the tournament.

title: [UNOFFICAL  TOURNAMENT]
